item.title: Roblox: Build a Habitat Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Build a Habitat is an interesting Roblox experience that allows you to design your own garden. There, you will have to place various objects on your plot and attract different animals to create a truly diverse habitat. The game has many things you can use to decorate your garden, and some of them can be obtained for free. In this guide, we will tell you about Build a Habitat codes and explain how to redeem them for free goodies.

All Build a Habitat Codes

Working Build a Habitat Codes

  • angryangler – Gives you x1 Anglerfish.

Expired Build a Habitat Codes

Currently, Build a Habitat doesn’t have expired promo codes. If any of these codes become unavailable to you and other Roblox players, we will update this section of our guide and list such bonuses here.

In Build a Habitat , you can customize your garden in many different ways, and one of the best among them is to add some animals. Promo codes can provide you with such creatures for free, and we highly recommend you redeem them as soon as possible. If you wait too long before activating these codes, you may lose your rewards.

How to Redeem Build a Habitat Codes

Promo codes in Build a Habitat can provide you with nice bonuses that will help you make your garden unique. However, if you want to get these rewards, you will have to learn how the redemption process works. Here is a list of steps you need to follow to redeem Build a Habitat codes and claim your freebies:

  • Open the Dream Catcher Studio group on Roblox and join it.
  • After that, launch Build a Habitat and wait for this Roblox experience to load.
  • Once the game is loaded, click on the gear icon in the top right corner of your screen to open the Settings menu.
  • On the right side of the Settings menu, you will see the line where you can type codes. Enter the coupon you want to redeem.
  • Click on the Submit button.
  • The reward is yours.

How to Get New Build a Habitat Codes

The developers of Build a Habitat may introduce new promo codes in future updates, and if they do, we will add them to our list. So, you can bookmark this guide and check it from time to time for new rewards. Also, you can follow the official media related to Build a Habitat :

  • Discord Server
Roblox

8.8 /10

item.title: Roblox: Clone Brainrot Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Clone Brainrot is one of the most fun experiences you can find on Roblox . There, you will be able to create an army of your clones that will follow you and repeat all your moves. Also, the game allows you to buy and use various abilities to perform different tricks. In order to purchase them, you will need a lot of money, and fortunately, there is a way to get some free bonuses. In this guide, we will tell you about free Clone Brainrot codes and how to redeem them.

All Clone Brainrot Codes

Working Clone Brainrot Codes

  • RELEASE – Gives you x5,000 Cash.
  • BRAINROT – Gives you 5 slots for clones.

Expired Clone Brainrot Codes

Currently, there are no expired Clone Brainrot codes. If any of these bonuses become unavailable to you and other players, we will update this paragraph and add them to the list.

Clone Brainrot has lots of different abilities and passives that you can purchase from the shop. By using promo codes, you can get extra cash to buy the things you want. Also, codes in Clone Brainrot can increase your clone limit, which will help you earn more money.

The rewards you can get by activating codes in this Roblox experience are extremely useful, and we highly recommend you get them as soon as possible. These codes may expire in the future, and you won’t be able to obtain your freebies if this happens.

How to Redeem Clone Brainrot Codes

Promo codes in Clone Brainrot can provide you with a few decent rewards, and fortunately, they are easy to claim. The redemption process is very simple, and you only need to do a few things before you can activate these codes. Here is a list of steps you need to follow to redeem Clone Brainrot codes:

  • Open the Banging Games Roblox community and join it.
  • Launch Clone Brainrot and wait for the game to load.
  • After that, click on the blue icon in the top right corner of the screen.
  • Enter the code you want to redeem.
  • Click on the Redeem button.
  • The reward is yours.

How to Get New Clone Brainrot Codes

The Clone Brainrot developers may add new promo codes as the game grows in popularity. If they create more codes, we will update our guide and list them in this article. Feel free to bookmark it and use it as a source of information about all the latest codes.

item.title: EA Sports FC 26 Players May Want to Turn Off Crossplay
item.description:
A regional pricing error has reportedly allowed some EA Sports FC 26 players to purchase FC Points at a fraction of their regular price, with devastating consequences for the Ultimate Team economy. Since the glitch was only accessible on PC, anyone playing EA Sports FC 26 on a console may want to turn off crossplay—with one exception.

EA Sports FC 26 was released on September 26, following a week-long early access period. The latest entry in EA's soccer sim franchise is available on PC and the latest two generations of PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo consoles.

Thousands of FC Points Allegedly Sold for Cents to Some EA Sports FC 26 Players

The EA Sports FC 26 launch was reportedly not entirely smooth, having stumbled on a regional pricing issue that's affecting some people's enjoyment of the game. According to multiple fan testimonies circulating online, a decimal-point error that flew under the radar allowed some PC players in Indonesia to purchase 18,500 FC Points—normally priced at 2 million rupiah—for either 2,000 or 20,000 rupiah, the equivalent of $0.12/$1.20. Once the news of the glitch started spreading, some players have reportedly found success taking advantage of the erroneous pricing by spoofing their IP address with a VPN.

Player testimonies of the glitched price aren't entirely consistent; Reddit user Lawakawaa reports that the 18,500 FC Points pack retailed for 2,000 rupiah, but several other players claim that the price was 10 times higher. Still, even at 20,000 rupiah, the $120 microtransaction would have been available at 1% of its usual price. The exploit has apparently been abused widely enough to disrupt the EA Sports FC 26 Ultimate Team mode, with many people acquiring overpowered teams within hours of the game's international launch by buying FC Points for pennies on the dollar, prompting widespread complaints on social media from disadvantaged players.

How To Disable Crossplay in EA Sports FC 26

  1. Select the EA Connect option in the bottom-right corner of the Main Menu.
  2. Open Social Settings .
  3. Select Cross-play .
  4. Select Cross-play Settings .
  5. Under Cross-play Enabled , set to toggle to No .

EA has not yet acknowledged these fan grievances via its EASFCDirect Twitter account or any other channel. It is hence unclear whether the publisher will consider reversing the glitched transactions. Some countries, such as certain EU member states, force retailers to honor prices listed online, even if they were made in error, with few exceptions. However, the legal situation gets a lot murkier when VPNs come into play. According to several player testimonies reviewed by Game Rant, the VPN exploit only worked for transactions made via Apple Pay.

EA Sports FC 26 Switch Players Have Nothing to Worry About

Given the current state of affairs, console users may want to disable crossplay in EA Sports FC 26 unless they are prepared to consistently face overpowered squads in Ultimate Team mode so early into the game's launch. The only exception is for Switch and Switch 2 owners, as the Nintendo versions do not support crossplay with PC or other consoles.

EA Sports FC 26

item.title: Borderlands 4: All Evocarium Locations & Solutions
item.description:
There are a total of 18 Evocariums located in Borderlands 4 , and throughout Kairos, players can interact with them for SDU Tokens and to learn more about the story of Nyriad, an ancient Siren from long ago who once lived with the Eridian people. Evocariums all follow the same structure: locate the three orbs within the area to unlock the puzzle and claim the rewards, except these puzzles aren't often that easy. Below, we've listed all Evocariums across every region so that you can continue across your vast collection.

How to Solve the Coastal Bonescape Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

Head to the Coastal Bonescape to reach the Harper's Hideaway POI, where you can activate the Evocarium found on the upper floor of the south side. Once activated, head north to find two connected silos, and you can grapple them to reach high up. Follow the platform west and jump up to the building in front to grab the orb here. Returning to the Evocarium, head north west and mantle up the central large building, where you can find this orb beside a railing to the north. Still at the tall building, mantle onto the roof and climb down the south side to grab the final orb.

How to Solve the Waterstop Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

At the Waterstop POI in the Coastal Bonescape, you'll want to mantle onto the red rooftop on the east side to find the first orb up high. Now, glide to the north west side, where facing the north east will see players latch to a grapple point that will take them to a roof which contains the next orb. The final orb is located in the north west by the water pipes. Jump down into the pit to find a ladder, where climbing it reveals a small pathway to the final orb.

How to Solve the Hungering Plain Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

Upon reaching the Hungering Plain, you can venture to the Operant Control POI, where, by following the silos on the east side, you can find a grapple point that takes you to the Evocarium. Once activated, climb the ladder on the north east to reach one orb. From here, glide down to the silo in the north, just in front of the Evocarium, for the next orb. The final orb can be obtained by standing at the Evocarium and gliding south west to reach and mantle the roof of a nearby building.

How to Solve The Howl Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

The Howl's Evocarium puzzle can be found within the Wreck of the Maestar, accessible via a hole in the ground. Once here, you'll want to immediately turn right from the Evocarium to find one of the orbs in a tent. With this orb obtained, continue heading east, where you'll find another orb, by the edge of the ground. For the final orb, head back to the tent where you grabbed the first orb, and head north, where the final orb can be obtained from within the tent.

How to Solve the Idolator's Noose Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

Within Idolator's Noose, players can find the Tetanus Quad POI, where the Evocarium will be located by a Ripper drill. To begin, head south west to find a red barn, where, at the back, you can climb hay stacks to reach the roof for the first orb. Now, head north east to find another building, which can be mantled and then climbed with a grapple point on the east wall to get the next orb. The final orb will be located on the west side, where you can climb a ladder and look to the right to find a ledge, and a platform upwards to grab it.

How to Solve the Dissected Plataeu Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

Head through the Stubs in the Dissected Plateau to find a Ripper camp. From here, head up the ledge and climb the wall to reach the Evocarium. To start, north north west and glide over to the roof to find one of the orbs. With this orb obtained, return to the Evocarium and perform a double jump + glide in the south east to reach the other rooftop with an orb. For the final orb, head back to the Evocarium again, and glide north east for the final rooftop orb.

How to Solve the Hollowhome Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

This Evocarium is located very close to the Reliquary, an Order Silo located in Cuspid Climb of Terminus Range. Once players have entered Hollowhome, interact with the Evocarium on the cliff overlooking the POI. The first orb can be acquired by heading left, where you will be able to jump up a building's structure in order to mantle to the top for the orb. From this building, perform a jump and glide over to the south to reach the rooftop that contains the second orb. The last orb can be found on a rooftop in the southeast, so just glide from the second orb to reach this rooftop.

How to Solve the Cuspid Climb Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

Within Cuspid Climb, head to this Evocarium and look to the south east to find a grapple point. Use this grapple to reach higher ground, where you can follow the path to the left to reach a ledge that contains the first orb. This spot is also a great way to jump and glide to the north, where you can climb the building with mantles and jumps to reach the second orb. As for the final orb, head south west from the second orb and look to the back of the tall structure, as you will be able to climb the wall to reach the top.

How to Solve the Low Leys Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

This Evocarium is located within a Mangler den in the Low Leys, and it's fairly simple to solve. Once you've activated the Evocarium, head south west to find the first orb on the ledge of a rocky cliff. Follow this cliff to the west to find a wall that you can climb, where the second orb is just after having climbed said wall. Now, loop around to the south to find the final orb just by the ledge of the road.

How to Solve the Deathright Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

This Low Leys Evocarium is just to the south of the Deathright Order Silo. To begin, head to the west and climb the abandoned vehicle's roof, where you can jump and glide to mantle up to the first orb. From the first orb, jump and glide to the north east to reach the rooftop of an abandoned Order bunker that contains the second orb. For the final orb, grapple up to the building at the north west, and follow around to the right of this building for the final orb that's on the ledge.

How to Solve the Stoneblood Forest Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

The Evocarium in Stoneblood Forest can be found amidst a den of Wildhorns. To start, look past the Evocarium to find a rock ledge that you can stand on. Use this ledge to double jump and glide over to the first orb found on an abandoned outpost. Now, head to the south east to climb some rocks, where you can follow along the right ledge path to pick up the second orb. From this height, you can double jump and glide to the north east to locate the rooftop of the final orb.

How to Solve the Lopside Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

Head to Lopside, Carcadia Burn, where this Evocarium can be found among a Kratch hive. To begin, look to the right of the Evocarium to double jump and mantle a rock structure that contains the first orb. From here, use this high point to jump and glide towards the east to find the next orb on an abandoned jet engine. From on top of this station, glide north west towards the building that holds the final orb, and then jump and mantle onto the roof.

How to Solve the Lowrise Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

Head to the Lowrise Safehouse in Tonnage Peel, where, facing the south west side, you can drop all the way to the bottom of this canyon to find the Evocarium in the Wreck of the Cargonian, festering with Rippers. From the Evocarium, head south west and look right to find a hanging ladder that you can climb for the first orb. For the second orb, look south east and double jump across the rubble to reach the orb. As for the final orb, head north to use wind propulsion from the ground, and then climb up the building to find the final orb.

How to Solve the Tonnage Peel Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

The Tonnage Peel Evocarium can be started by heading south and following the ledge upwards to collect the first orb. The second is found in the south west region amidst the pool of green liquid, and the third can be located in the north west on some scrap metal.

How to Solve the Ruined Sumplands Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

As players reach Pain Street in the Ruined Sumplands, they'll find the Evocarium located here. To start, head north through an open container to find the first orb behind the sewage water. The next orb is located in the west building, where players can follow along the path to the right at the back of the building to follow the stairs upwards. After taking this orb, look to the east building and head to the back of it, where you can look up at and use a grapple station to reach the final orb.

How to Solve the Carcadia District Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

Once players have access to Dominion, they can head to the Carcadia District from the Final Defiance fast travel station and drop down into the depths for the Evocarium. Once here, head north west to find the first orb just sitting on the ground. Now, follow the large pipe at the south side upwards, which can be walked across from its right side. At the top of this pipe, glide over to the north building and use the wind propulsion to climb the building, where the final orb is found in the north west.

How to Solve the Terminus District Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

Head to the Frantic Scrawl fast travel station in the Terminus District of Dominion, and venture south for this Evocarium, which is found in the Dunk POI. Immediately to the right of the Evocarium is an orb that can be picked up, and now players want to head east to climb a container that allows them to jump up to the next orb. Now, jump off the scaffolding, double jump, and glide over to the left path of the south west wall for the final orb.

How to Solve the Fades District Evocarium Puzzle in Borderlands 4

At the Sumpview Falls Safehouse in the Fades District, players can head up to the Evocarium located within the Lakeside Properties. The first orb is located just to the left on the rooftop of a building to the south west. Climb back to the Evocarium, and glide to the north to reach a building with a green tent roof, where the orb is inside. Now, jump and glide over to the container scaffolding, where the final orb can be found just behind the red container.

22
7.9 /10
8 /10

Borderlands 4

item.title: Clash Royale Creator Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Clash Royale is one of the most popular mobile games in the world, and thousands of players play it every day, each trying to become the best. Many gamers often check resources, such as YouTubers or streamers, to understand their strategy or even copy their deck to be as good in battles. Once you have gained experience and a working strategy after watching the video, you can support your favorite player by redeeming Clash Royale creator codes. This way, after each purchase, the chosen creator will receive a piece of the profits, so it's a great way to thank those who helped you.

Updated September 27, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Clash Royale offers a long list of creator codes that you can use to support your favorite content creators directly in the game. These codes don’t give you in-game rewards but allow you to show appreciation when making purchases. The variety covers popular streamers, YouTubers, and community figures, so you can pick the one that fits you best. It’s worth checking the list regularly, as more creators may be added over time.

Clash Royale: All Creator Codes

The number of creators is growing every day, as is their fanbase. At the moment, there are already many creators in the game whose code you can redeem to support them. Below are all the current creators codes, so you can choose the one you deem your favorite.

Clash Royale: How to Redeem Creator Codes

Redeeming Creator Codes in Clash Royale is not difficult and will take you a few clicks. If you haven't done it before, here are the detailed instructions:

  • Go to the in-game store.
  • Scroll down until you see the Creator Boost section.
  • There will be a green Enter Code button in the Creator Boost section. Click on it.
  • After doing so, you will open a new menu with an input field and an OK button.
  • Now enter one of the above Creator Codes in the input field.
  • Click the OK button to confirm your choice.

It is worth noting that by redeeming the code, you will not support one creator forever. You can change to another at any time.
